/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and power lines, adding a touch of urban greenery to the scene. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, contributing to the lively atmosphere. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
